segments.text: Did you see Victor on Wednesday , Wendy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We went for a walk in the woods near the highway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wasn ’ t it cold on Wednesday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It was very cold and windy . We wore heavy wool sweaters and walked quickly to keep warm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s so nice and quiet in the woods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Farther away from the highway it was very quiet and there were birds and squirrels everywhere . We counted over twenty squirrels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds wonderful . Did you take lunch with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we bought veal sandwiches . We stopped around twelve , and we ate and watched the squirrels , but it was too windy to sit long . It was a very nice walk , anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
